    • Method Detail

      • acceptsCookies

        public static boolean acceptsCookies(org.hippoecm.hst.core.component.HstRequest request,
                                     org.hippoecm.hst.core.component.HstResponse response)
        Check if browser is accepting cookies NOTE: we need at least two request to decide if client is accepting cookies so this method is "partially" useful (e.g. when checking for cookies when page is loaded with ajax)
        Returns:
        true if accepting

        public static void setSessionCookie(org.hippoecm.hst.core.component.HstResponse response,
                                    String name,
                                    String value)
        Sets cookie which will expire after browser is closed
        Parameters:
        response - the HST response
        name - cookie name
        value - cookie value

      • setCookie

        public static void setCookie(org.hippoecm.hst.core.component.HstResponse response,
                             String name,
                             String value,
                             int age)
        Set a cookie without path (or domain)
        Parameters:
        response - the HST response
        name - cookie name
        value - cookie value
        age - cookie age in seconds

      • setCookie

        public static void setCookie(org.hippoecm.hst.core.component.HstResponse response,
                             String name,
                             String value,
                             int age,
                             String domain,
                             String path,
                             boolean secure)
        Creates and sets the cookie onto response
        Parameters:
        response - the HST response
        name - cookie name
        value - cookie value
        age - cookie age in seconds
        domain - cookie domain (optional)
        path - cookie path, defaults to root ('/')
        secure - is cookie secure
